### Graphviz `r fontawesome::fa("chart-pie", fill="#F49FF6")`

```{dot}
//| echo: true
//| output-location: column-fragment
//| classes: custom4060
//| fig-width: 5

// Graphviz:

graph G {
  layout=neato
  run -- intr;
  intr -- runbl;
  runbl -- run;
  run -- kernel;
  kernel -- zombie;
  kernel -- sleep;
  kernel -- runmem;
  sleep -- swap;
  swap -- runswap;
  runswap -- new;
  runswap -- runmem;
  new -- runmem;
  sleep -- runmem;
}

```

:::

:::

:::{.notes}
Note that square brackets `[]`, parentheses `()`, and curly brackets `{}` are controlling the object borders
